items.content_html: Modern, simple, lightweight (~5kb gzip) form validation library written in Typescript, with no dependencies (no JQuery!). Support a wide range of pre-defined rules (plus it's possible to define own custom rules), async validation, custom error messages and styles, localization.
items.title: horprogs/Just-validate: Modern, simple, lightweight (~5kb gzip) form validation library written in Typescript, with no dependencies (no JQuery!). Support a wide range of pre-defined rules (plus it's possible to define own custom rules), async validation, custom error messages and styles, localization.
